title: Read My Fortune!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Nozomi! Read my fortune!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Full of energy as always, huh, Lanzhu-chan. I use tarot, is that okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yes! Lanzhu has always wanted you to read my fortune!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m honored. Sure then, let’s do it~. What do you want to know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Umm, you see.... Lanzhu wants to know if Lanzhu can get along with everyone....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I think you already did, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Of course! Everyone is best friends with me! But Lanzhu wants to know if we all can stay like this from now on and forever!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, I can try reading that, but I think whether that wish of yours will come true or not all depends on your own feelings, Lanzhu-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Huh, you’re right, Nozomi.... You’re so wise!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Not that much. But, since you’re here, I might as well read something else for you. Let’s see.... How about what we should order at the cafe after this♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>That will be great! Please read it for me, Nozomi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
